iati-activity.title: WASH4PH (WASH for Public Health)
iati-activity.description: WASH 4 Public Health Programme intends to contribute to endogenous development and transformational change in the two intervention districts: Bongo and Bawku West in the Upper East Region. This will be achieved through town a focused small town approach bring about transformational change. This

Centre for Scientific and Industrial Research
National Institute for Environmental Res. and Advo
